title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Go CLI and server that bundles, serves and keeps Llama-2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs running locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to talk with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that adds Ollama as a first-class LLM provider inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring chat history, model management and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-powered interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with readline, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as GitHub-Copilot-like completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints with builders and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to Ollama’s generate/chat/embed APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use any Ollama model as a generator or embedder in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, fine-tune adapters, Docker patterns.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stacks with CUDA, Open-WebUI, watchtower and persistent volumes.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that calls Ollama for inline AI assistance, summarization and block generation.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode to answer questions with Ollama models privately.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama-based chat and embed endpoints with admin UI for model control.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server, WebUI and model caches for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin for AI-assisted writing, summarization and note Q&A via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API with serde models.
